description: React component for a sidebar used in a kanban board application, managing board navigation, creation, deletion, and emoji updates.

methods.name: handleCreateBoard
methods.description: Handles creation of a new board, dispatches actions, and navigates to the new board.

methods.name: handleBoardClick
methods.description: Sets the clicked board as active and navigates to it.

methods.name: handleDeleteBoard
methods.description: Deletes a board after confirmation, updates state, and navigates if necessary.

methods.name: handleEmojiClick
methods.description: Opens emoji picker for a specific board.

methods.name: handleEmojiSelect
methods.description: Updates the emoji of a board after selection.
